# claude-code-showcase

## Description

Comprehensive configuration example demonstrating reusable skills and agents.

## Key Contents

- **CLAUDE.md** - Project memory (stack info, commands, code style)
- **.claude/settings.json** - Hooks for auto-formatting, testing, branch protection
- **Skills** - Domain knowledge docs (testing patterns, GraphQL schema)
- **Agents** - Specialized assistants (code review agent post-changes)
- **Commands** - Slash commands including `/ticket` for JIRA/Linear
- **MCP Servers** - JIRA, GitHub, Slack, databases
- **GitHub Actions** - PR reviews, docs sync, quality checks, dependency audits

## Philosophy

> "A ton of maintenance and quality work is just... automated."

## Features

- Quality gates automation
- Ticket system integration
- Maintenance task automation
